function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Positive impact on hygiene behavior from social media","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on social media for covid-19 information","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of fake news related to covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of social media on psychological well-being","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Circulation of the questionnaire on social media platforms may lead to a lack of representativeness in the respondent sample, risking biased results.","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High frequency of social media use for following recent news may lead to exposure to misinformation and rumors about covid-19.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on social media for communication and decision making may lead to echo chambers and confirmation bias, influencing public perception of covid-19.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of individuals without internet access from the research may lead to a biased representation of the population’s social media use during the pandemic.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of physical data collection due to lockdown may limit the scope and accuracy of the research findings.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of standardized questions related to covid-19 may affect the consistency and comparability of the survey data.","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased social media use due to covid-19 related news and anxiety.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on social media for healthcare support and information.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Prediction of user behaviors and panic-related searches on google trends.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of fake news creating panic and anxiety","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social media use leading to anxiety and psychological problems","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fast publishing of unfinished or unobserved research during covid-19 leading to circulation of fake news","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive transmission of fake news over social media creating chaos and stress","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of official logos in fake news","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise of racism and xenophobia towards patients and visitors","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low propensity of physicians to use social media for knowledge sharing due to high occupational stress","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in home residency due to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remote learning in public schools","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited funds availability for transportation agencies due to covid-19","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in tax revenues due to limited consumer investment and economic activity","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Struggle to attract riders back onto public conveyances due to pandemic concerns","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"30% decline in cp revenue projected nationwide","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drastic decline in traffic and personal travel patterns in metropolitan cities","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in public transportation use","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented research on the interaction between covid-19, housing policies, and green housing may lead to incomplete understanding of the components.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of micro-level building and macro-level city, country aspects of green housing during and after the covid-19 era may result in ineffective housing policies.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on crisis-response measures, support for tenants and owners, and recovery strategies in housing policies may increase the risk of disease propagation and affect resident wellbeing.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of how buildings affect health in the context of a pandemic","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainties caused by the covid-19 pandemic leading to a lack of pragmatic instructions to reduce indoor risks","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on the relationship between green housing and covid-19","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Interactions between covid-19, housing policies, and resident behaviors influence green housing requirements","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited evidence on the impact of green housing in the context of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive coverage of all affected countries in the literature review","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of investigation into the impact of housing policies on green housing and resident wellbeing during covid-19","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient analysis of the impact of green buildings, interest groups, and covid-19 on the built environment","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased human-machine interaction","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Slow movement of the internet of things towards humanization","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased online shopping leading to empty retail spaces","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Obsolete parking spaces due to decreased demand","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in land use and zoning due
